channel.title: pinchy claw
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "pinchy claw"

item.title: Re: pinchy claw
item.content:encoded: Ingredients, yes, I forgot the word.There's a difference between it and resource gathering.So basically you have a 10% chance for Lunar Overclocking on your current ingredient collection, and +500 ryo every time you gather resources.

item.title: Re: pinchy claw
item.content:encoded:
thanks.
you meant 10% chance in ingredient collecting or resources?

item.title: Re: pinchy claw
item.content:encoded: ? You are wrong.10% chance to activate the rare ingredients on your current collection, and you gain 500 ryo when you collect resources for your village.

item.title: pinchy claw
item.content:encoded: what does pinchy claw exactly do?i got it but i didn't get any rare ingredient or 500 ryo when collecting!
